The presence of a screenshot and a video: which claim to show the suspects arrested over the killing of a Philippine teenager.
The misleading headline of the posts: when translated to English, falsely states that three suspects involved in the rape and murder of a 16-year-old girl in Lapu-Lapu city have been arrested.
The use of a reverse image search: which traced the photo of the three men used in the misleading posts back to a YouTube video about the arrest of six young Filipino men in 2018 for marijuana-related charges.
The verification through a search engine: IntelTechniques, which connected the pixelated image in the misleading post to similar pictures of the murdered girl that have appeared in Philippine media.
